name: HATS
short_description: HATS (Haplotype Amplification in Tumor Sequences) is a tool that calls the amplified alleles, and thus amplified haplotype, in copy number aberration regions in next generation sequencing tumor data.  The amplified haplotype may reveal gene variants.
